violations.description: More than 1000 people in a single zone at any time.
violations.recommendation: Reduce the number of people or adjust zones.

violations.description: Persons nearby without green, light blue, dark blue, purple, orange badges.
violations.recommendation: Ensure all persons have required badges.

violations.description: Attended bags, weapons, or unknown packages.

violations.recommendation: Stop any fighting and report to supervisor.

violations.description: All persons in work zones must wear required PPE.
violations.recommendation: Ensure all persons are wearing required PPE.

report.summary: The scene observation is non-compliant with multiple rules. Please review the rule descriptions and take appropriate action to ensure compliance.
